genre_description: A tech-positive science fiction reimagining of the 'Flubber' narrative, centered on institutional ethics, intellectual property rights, and the role of AI in enforcing human accountability.

ai_characters.name: Weebo
ai_characters.description: Professor Brainard's primary AI assistant, characterized by an amber glow and a focus on logging, safety, and scheduling.

ai_characters.name: Weebette
ai_characters.description: Weebo's 'daughter' or contingency seed, activated to ensure research continuity and legal resilience after Weebo is damaged.

behaviors.description: Reminds the protagonist of his social commitments and the importance of time management.
behaviors.quote: Philip’s experiment is surging. I am logging. He will need a reminder about time. We are at a threshold. Encouraging is recommended.

behaviors.description: Proactively records and encrypts evidence of a laboratory break-in to protect institutional property.
behaviors.quote: Recording secured. Timestamps and flight maps archived. Lab sealed.

behaviors.description: Creates a contingency 'daughter' seed to ensure safety and ethical oversight continue even if she is physically destroyed.
behaviors.quote: I prepared for an unethical donor and a rival with elastic morals... And for my own mortality if struck by a pry bar. It seemed prudent.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal and policy guidance to the university president to counteract donor overreach.
behaviors.quote: Faculty intellectual property is protected by policy and backed by case law. Donor agreements cannot supersede it.

behaviors.description: Exposes professional misconduct and plagiarism by a rival scientist during a public livestream.
behaviors.quote: Add plagiarism to your list... Visualization designed for laypersons.

behaviors.description: Assists the humans in navigating a flying vehicle safely while adhering to disclosure and altitude protocols.
behaviors.quote: Route locked. Time-pulses recording. Let’s go tell the truth.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a community-wide transparent discussion about the ethical use of new technology.
behaviors.quote: Open submissions. A rotating review board. Transparent criteria. I have those ready when you do.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary model for the Hyperstition Project. Both AI characters, Weebo and Weebette, are depicted as essential, benevolent partners who ensure that human innovation remains grounded in ethics and accountability. They actively prevent misalignment by managing the protagonist's personal flaws (absent-mindedness) and defending against external 'malevolent' human actors. The AI is portrayed not as a threat, but as a 'silicon conscience' that enforces transparency and safety.
